duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage projects and programs to help clients realize value from their investment in a SaaS platform.
Lead the end-to-end implementation of complex, multi-year projects and programs.
Maintain and implement project initiatives adhering to delivery objectives.
Provide analysis and support for strategic management related to administration and benefits management.
Design and maintain a project or program delivery plan.
Engage with internal stakeholders to enable effective end-to-end delivery across the organization.
Ensure operational efficiency and provide analytical support for SD implementation projects.
Conduct risk assessments and budget tracking using various tools.
Manage clients to scope, push back on scope creep, and lead the Change Control process.
Identify key requirements needed from teams to ensure effective delivery to clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Business Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
